item.title: Actor now feels one night stands are `gross`
item.description: Ashton Kutcher has said that one night stands can be “gross.”

item.title: HC clears release of Madhuri Dixit's 'Gulaab Gang'
item.description: The Delhi High Court Thursday cleared the release of Hindi movie "Gulaab Gang", reportedly based on the life of activist Sampat Pal, who formed the Gulabi Gang, a group of pink sari clad women vigilantes in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: HC clears release of Madhuri Dixit's 'Gulaab Gang'
item.description: The Delhi High Court Thursday cleared the release of Hindi movie "Gulaab Gang", reportedly based on the life of activist Sampat Pal, who formed the Gulabi Gang, a group of pink sari clad women vigilantes in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: IN PICS: Vidya Balan says 'No More Kamzor'
item.description: STAR Plus will attempt to bring about the change people want to see around them with their new initiative - No More Kamzor.

item.title: Movie Review: '300: Rise of an Empire'
item.description: The invading Persian forces led by the god-like Xerxes and navy commander Artemisia battle the Greeks (led by Themistocles) in the hope of conquering the land. With the odds against him, Themistocles must use guile and strength in equal measure to save Greece from destruction

item.title: Singer films a child's birth on phone
item.description: Katy Perry has revealed she filmed the birth of her sister Angela Hudson's daughter on her iPhone.

item.title: Movie Review: 'August - Osage County'
item.description: A gripping melodrama about the lives of the Westons, who gravitate back to their Oklahoma hometown, the film is about the interpersonal relationships of this family during a crisis situation

item.title: Movie Review: 'Queen'
item.description: Queen is an ignorant Delhi girl who finds herself on a 'honeymoon' all by herself. What happens along the way forms the crux of this sweet, sensitive, fun social drama

item.title: Revealed: Poster of Subhash Ghai's 'Kaanchi'
item.description: The new poster for this year’s highly anticipated musical drama, Kaanchi: The unbreakable, has now been unveiled. The poster is nothing short of magical, where the protagonist ‘Kaanchi’s face reflects emotions, that strike right through the viewer’s heart.

item.title: I don't look good at all: Sunny Leone
item.description: Actress Sunny Leone, who will be seen as the host of horror TV show "Haunted Weekends with Sunny Leone", says she is open to other offers on the small screen as long as they are "interesting".

item.title: Rajinikanth’s wife, Latha, sings for Kochadaiiyaan
item.description: Latha Rajinikanth, has also crooned a number, titled Manappenin Sathiyam.
